## cu export

Export data to various formats

### Synopsis

Export ClickUp data to CSV, JSON, or Markdown formats.

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for export
```

```
      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.config/cu/config.yml)
      --debug           enable debug mode

```
